issue_title: [Feature] Add due_date field to Todo data model

tdd_sequence.description: Create failing tests for due_date feature
tests: Create Todo with no due_date (default empty string)
set_due_date() with invalid format raises ValueError
is_overdue returns None when no due_date set
is_overdue returns False for future dates
is_overdue returns True for past dates

tdd_sequence.description: Implement minimal code to pass tests
implementation: Add due_date: str = "" field to Todo dataclass
Add set_due_date(date_str: str) -> None method with ISO validation
Add is_overdue property returning bool | None
Update from_dict() to handle due_date field
